oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Collection of Mohammedan prayers] : manuscript, undated
Hādhā al-aḥādīth al-nabawīyah
Īn nūr nāṣiḥ
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Collection of prayers and various devotional writings in prose and poetry.
Ms is composed of 1 bound vol. and three separate fragments.
Written in several hands, in one or two columns, 7-12 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. Sentences framed within a red line for most of the text.
MS Arab 35. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Arabic and a South-Asian language in Arabic script.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Muḥammad--Prophet---632
Islam
Arabic poetry

اين نور ناصح
